channel.title: Star Wars Saturdays: Star Warbirds
channel.description:
In April, on Saturdays at 9 AM Eastern, I'm running the game Warbirds, hacked a little to fit into Star Wars. What's Warbirds? Warbirds is a game about flying and fighting for fame and fortune. Step into the role of a Guild pilot and go head to head in fast-paced aerial and space combat powered by Outrider Studios’ Rapidfire system. Build your fame as a daring ace pilot to receive opportunities to star in HoloVids, sponsor products, feature in graphic netbooks, and gain the perks of sector-wide celebrity. Games are Saturday mornings at 9 AM Eastern.
[Session 1](https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-LYscwDmvQn-0so5cAjR) [date=2019-04-06 time=10:00:00 timezone="America/Sao_Paulo"] → [date=2019-04-06 time=13:00:00 timezone="America/Sao_Paulo"] [Session 2](https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-LYscxd3yt669oQ_Rrm1) [date=2019-04-13 time=10:00:00 timezone="America/Sao_Paulo"] → [date=2019-04-13 time=13:00:00 timezone="America/Sao_Paulo"] [Session 3](https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-LYsczJXztlfXbKbc1db) [date=2019-04-20 time=10:00:00 timezone="America/Sao_Paulo"] → [date=2019-04-20 time=13:00:00 timezone="America/Sao_Paulo"]
